name: Isolate by Charles River, 1BD Apt in Back Bay
description:
Gorgeous renovated garden level apartment in the heart of Back Bay, steps to Newbury, Prudential, Public Gardens.

Quality finishings: Granite counters, Miele appliances, jet bathtub, beautiful hardwood flooring throughout, recessed lighting. Garden-level with full windows. Marlboro St is one of the nicest streets in all of Boston! Walk everywhere. Close to the Charles River, great walking routes, tons of shopping, restaurants, museums, etc.

Boston Registration #: STR433416

The space
Take a house tour:
https://www.dropbox.com/s/rve3g685xsqdkwm/261%20Marlborough%20House%20Tour.mp4?dl=0

Other things to note
It's a small studio, pics might make it seem a bit larger. It's a garden level studio (ie basement) but it has windows as shown in the picture.

License number
Exempt: This listing is a unit that has contracts with hospitals
